item.title: 巴西通胀放缓，市场对 6 月利率会议看法不一
item.description: 在巴西央行行长开会决定是否延长其激进的加息周期之前，巴西 5 月份的年度通胀率降幅超过预期，结束了连续三个月的上升势头。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation eased more than expected in May, snapping three months of advances before central bankers meet to decide whether or not to extend their aggressive cycle of interest rate hikes.】

item.title: SmartLess "播客主持人正在创办一家电话公司
item.description:
演员们看到了数据量较低的移动服务所蕴含的商机

。【原文：

Actors see opportunity in mobile service with lower data

】

item.title: 与瑞波债务产品合作，古根海姆拓展加密货币领域
item.description: 古根海姆财资服务公司（Guggenheim Treasury Services）在成功推出首款与数字分类账挂钩的债务产品后，又与加密货币公司瑞波（Ripple）合作扩大了该产品的范围。【原文：After a successful rollout of its first digital ledger-linked debt offering, Guggenheim Treasury Services is expanding the product in a tie-up with crypto firm Ripple.】

item.title: 近期糖价下跌吸引买家，白糖涨势扩大
item.description: 原糖连续第二天攀升，原因是市场乐观地认为近期的下跌将吸引买家，而且原油价格走强可能促使糖厂将更多甘蔗转用于生产乙醇。【原文：Raw sugar climbed for a second day on optimism that recent declines would draw in buyers and stronger crude prices may prompt mills to divert more cane to make ethanol.】

item.title: 据称 Blackstone 将酝酿在未来几周内启动 Cirsa IPO
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正考虑在未来几周内启动西班牙赌场运营商 Cirsa Enterprises 的首次公开募股，因为波动性的减弱为公司在夏季淡季前上市打开了一扇窗。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering launching an initial public offering of Spanish casino operator Cirsa Enterprises as soon as the coming weeks, according to people familiar with the matter, as fading volatility has opened a window for companies to go public before the summer lull.】

item.title: 能源交易商将赌注押在金属上，LME正在密切关注
item.description:
行业领先的交易所正在采用先发制人的方法来管理市场，因为新参与者的仓位越来越大。【原文：

The industry’s leading exchange is using a preemptive approach to police the market as new participants take bigger positions.

】

item.title: CoreWeave 和 Palantir 因股价飙升而成为 "备忘录股票 "的对比对象
item.description: CoreWeave Inc.和 Palantir Technologies Inc.的股价飙升，让人们将其与 "备忘录股"（meme stocks）相提并论；这些股票的快速上涨是由散户交易者的狂热而非财务业绩推动的。【原文：The surging shares of CoreWeave Inc. and Palantir Technologies Inc. are drawing comparisons to meme stocks — whose rapid gains are fueled by retail trader fervor more than financial performance.】

item.title: 新加坡与马来西亚亿万富翁国王的儿子交换优质土地
item.description: 新加坡政府正在将其最昂贵的住宅飞地之一的一块土地转让给马来西亚亿万富翁国王的长子，以换取其家族拥有了一个多世纪的一块更大的空地。【原文：Singapore’s government is transferring a plot of land in one of its priciest residential enclaves to the eldest son of Malaysia’s billionaire king, in exchange for a larger vacant parcel that his family has owned for more than a century.】

item.title: 英国有史以来最大彩票奖可能在周二开出
item.description: 在周五的欧洲百万彩票开奖没有中奖之后，英国有史以来最大的彩票奖可能会在周二产生。【原文：The biggest lottery prize the UK has ever seen could be won on Tuesday after Friday's EuroMillions draw had no winners.】

item.title: 洲际酒店集团首席执行官表示，旅游 "反弹 "预示着夏季的良好前景
item.description: 洲际酒店集团（InterContinental Hotels Group Plc）首席执行官埃利-马鲁夫（Elie Maalouf）表示，尽管全球紧张局势加剧，但最近从欧洲到美国的旅游 "反弹 "对酒店业来说是个好兆头。【原文：InterContinental Hotels Group Plc Chief Executive Officer Elie Maalouf said a recent “bounceback” in travel from Europe to the US bodes well for the hotelier even as global tensions surge.】

item.title: 抵押贷款机构 Better 聘用前美国联邦住房管理局金融科技主管领导人工智能平台
item.description: 抵押贷款机构 Better 聘用联邦住房金融局前金融技术主管莉亚-普莱斯（Leah Price）掌管其人工智能平台。【原文：Mortgage lender Better tapped the Federal Housing Finance Agency’s former financial technology lead, Leah Price, to helm its artificial intelligence platform.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构正在研究私人市场数据
item.description: 澳大利亚的企业监管部门正在仔细检查私人信贷数据，在该国 4.2 万亿澳元（2.7 万亿美元）养老金行业的推动下，私人信贷出现了强劲增长。【原文：Australia’s corporate watchdog is scrutinizing data on private credit that has seen strong growth driven by the country’s A$4.2 trillion ($2.7 trillion) pensions sector.】

item.title: 交易员警惕大胆押注拖累信贷波动率接近历史最低点
item.description: 由于对近期贸易摩擦的后果缺乏信心，信贷投资者正在回避大胆的押注，导致波动率跌至历史最低点。【原文：Credit investors are eschewing bold bets, with a lack of conviction over the fallout from recent trade ructions dragging volatility toward an all-time low.】

item.title: 图片显示，运载电动汽车的船只在大火几天后仍在燃烧
item.description: 美国海岸警卫队公布了上周起火后被遗弃在太平洋上的一艘船的图片。【原文：The US Coast Guard released images of a ship that was abandoned in the Pacific Ocean after catching fire last week.】

item.title: 伊朗航空公司在制裁后订单中寻找飞机和合作伙伴
item.description: 伊朗国家航空公司正准备迎接终于摆脱美国制裁的那一天。【原文：Iran’s national airline is preparing for the day when it’s finally released from the US sanctions that have worn down its fleet and crimped access to other nations.】

item.title: 零售人群正在进行更大、更冒险的摇摆
item.description:
从特斯拉 ETF 到暴涨的人工智能股票，日间交易者热衷于投机。【原文：

From Tesla ETFs to frothy AI stocks, day traders are eager to speculate. 

】

item.title: 尽管受到打击，Switch 2 经销商仍推动日本市场蓬勃发展
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯提供彭博社全球记者对科技商业的报道和分析。今天，根岸真由美（Mayumi Negishi）将报道黄牛党的反击，他们想方设法在授权零售店之外获取和销售新款 Switch 2 游戏机。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Mayumi Negishi reports on the backlash against scalpers who are finding ways to obtain and sell the new Switch 2 game console outside the authorized retail outlets.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行警告：热门的美国国债押注有可能成为下一个痛苦交易
item.description: 据法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）称，押注美国长期国债收益率将以快于短期国债收益率的速度持续上升的投资者有可能血本无归。【原文：Investors betting that yields on long-dated US Treasuries will keep rising faster than those on shorter notes risk getting burned, according to BNP Paribas SA.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁破坏美国中西部工厂复兴
item.description: 美国中西部地区几乎占据了全美三分之一的制造业工作岗位和生产产出，但二十年前，当工厂的就业岗位流向海外时，中西部地区遭受了重创。【原文：The Midwestern US, which accounts for almost a third of all manufacturing jobs and production output in America, was devastated when factory employment went offshore two decades ago.】

item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天，我们通过 30 年期债券来探讨对美国预算前景日益增长的担忧。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 西班牙中央银行预测西班牙将出现两年来最慢季度增长
item.description: 据西班牙中央银行最新预测，本季度西班牙经济增长速度将是近两年来最慢的。【原文：Spain’s economy will grow at the slowest pace in almost two years this quarter, according to new forecasts from the central bank.】

item.title: 海湾石油产量恢复有助于特朗普推动能源主导地位
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统推动更多的钻井活动，美国的石油产量将在今明两年上升。但随着原油价格的下跌，大部分增长将来自一个令人惊讶的地方：墨西哥湾。【原文：US oil production is poised to rise this year and next as President Donald Trump pushes for more drilling. But as crude prices tumble, most of the growth will come from a surprising source: the Gulf of Mexico.】

item.title: 分析师警告资本规则将影响回购，瑞银集团股价下跌
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）创下两个月来最大跌幅，原因是分析师警告说，瑞士提出的新资本要求可能会削弱该银行的竞争力和向投资者支付款项的能力。【原文：UBS Group AG fell the most in two months as analyst warned that new capital demands imposed by Switzerland could crimp the bank’s competitiveness and its ability to make investor payouts.】

item.title: 腾讯音乐收购喜马拉雅，发力在线媒体领域
item.description: 腾讯音乐娱乐集团（Tencent Music Entertainment Group）已同意以 13 亿美元现金加发行股票的方式收购中国播客创业公司喜马拉雅公司（Ximalaya Inc.【原文：Tencent Music Entertainment Group has agreed to buy Chinese podcasting startup Ximalaya Inc. for $1.3 billion in cash plus an issuance of stock, a deal that propels its ambition to become China’s answer to Spotify.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金敦促欧盟尽快统一资本市场
item.description: 挪威是世界上最大的主权财富基金，该基金呼吁欧盟加快统一其资本市场的步伐。【原文：Norway’s sovereign wealth fund, the world’s largest, is calling on the European Union to accelerate efforts to unify its capital markets.】

item.title: 非洲进出口银行称惠誉下调评级基于 "错误观点
item.description: 非洲进出口银行抨击惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）称，该公司将非洲进出口银行的评级下调至比垃圾级高一级、前景展望为负面的决定是基于一个错误的前提。【原文：African Export-Import Bank lashed out at Fitch Ratings saying its decision to cut its assessment to one step above junk with a negative outlook was based on a false premise.】

item.title: 德国授予公民身份创历史新高，俄罗斯人大幅增加
item.description: 去年，获得德国国籍的人数增加了近 50%，再创历史新高，其中叙利亚人再次推动了入籍人数的激增，俄罗斯人的入籍人数也大幅增加。【原文：The number of people granted German citizenship jumped by almost 50% to another record last year, with Syrians again fueling the surge as well as a significant increase in the naturalization of Russians.】

item.title: 百胜中国在十月金十字之后形成死亡十字架
item.description: 百胜中国控股公司股价的 50 天移动平均线在 10 月份形成金叉后，跌破了 200 天移动平均线。【原文：The 50-day moving average of Yum China Holdings Inc. shares fell below their 200-day moving average after forming a golden cross in October.】

item.title: 匈牙利将增售 30 亿欧元欧洲债券以填补预算缺口
item.description: 匈牙利突然提高了外币债务发行目标，因为政府正在寻求新的资金来填补不断扩大的预算缺口。【原文：Hungary abruptly boosted its foreign-currency debt issuance target as the government sought fresh funds to plug a widening budget gap.】

item.title: 美国小型企业景气度今年首次上升
item.description: 由于企业对经济前景更加乐观，5 月份美国小型企业的情绪在 2025 年来首次出现上升。【原文：Sentiment among US small businesses rose in May for the first time in 2025 as firms grew more upbeat about the economic outlook.】
